minesweeper.gui

Class CountUpTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • minesweeper.gui.CountUpTimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, EventListener

    public class CountUpTimer
extends Object
implements ActionListener
    Timer class that counts up from seconds to minutes and shows the passed time in the game
    Author:
    juri

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CountUpTimer()
      Creates the JLabel and setups the timer to go off every second.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) 
      String getTime()
      Takes the String from the timeLabel and modifies it to show only time portion of it.
      JLabel getTimeLabel() 
      void resetTimer()
      Resets the JLabel and the ints representing time back to zero.
      void start()
      Starts the time if it isn't already running.
      void stop()
      Stops the timer
